data.text: Hwan ni yei a ɔfiri Edom reba,
Adɛn enti na mo ntadeɛ bere kɔɔ,
Na aweretɔ da wɔ mʼakoma mu
Mehwɛeɛ, nanso na ɔboafoɔ biara nni hɔ,
Metiatiaa amanaman no so wɔ mʼabufuo mu;
Ɔkaa sɛ, “Ampa ara wɔyɛ me nkurɔfoɔ,
Wɔn amanehunu nyinaa mu, ɔno nso hunuu amane,
Afei ne nkurɔfoɔ kaee tete nna no,
Deɛ ɔsomaa nʼanimuonyam basa a ɛwɔ tumi
deɛ ɔdii wɔn anim faa ebunu mu
Sɛdeɛ anantwie nante kɔ ɛserɛ so kɔhome no,
Nanso wo ara wo ne yɛn Agya
Adɛn, Ao Awurade, na woma yɛn kwati wʼakwan
Ɛberɛ tiawa bi mu wo nkurɔfoɔ faa wo kronkronbea
Enti yɛyɛ wo dea firi tete
